summary: Adds a too Op Armor to the game, just if you want some fun, the armor is simple and based on the dragon plate armor, also add some big count money near the whiterun's tower
descriptionHtml:
This Mod Add a Complete Armor, using the Dragon Armor has base with some new abilities, it can be too Op ([u][color=#ff0000]Overpowered[/color][/u]) used only if you want some fun ;)

Also, is recommended to use this mod after completing each[color=#ffff00][u] whiterun main quets,[/u][/color] don't ask me why!

And it also have a little story Book with some  [color=#f1c232][u]Money[/u][/color] :)

This Is My [color=#00ffff][b][i][u]FIRST MOD[/u][/i][/b][/color]

So Please Any Comment or Recommendation [u][color=#ff0000]Bad o[/color][color=#00ffff]r not[/color][/u] Will Be A GREAT HELP!

You can Found The Armor in the tower [u][color=#00ff00]Near Of Whiterun!

[/color][/u]
[u][color=#00ff00]Armor Attributes:

1- God's Crown-

A-  Water breathing (1000pts)
B-  Super strength (1000pts)
C-  Fortify snake (1000)
D-  Fortify stamina  (1000pts)
E-  Fortify health (1000pts)
F-  Fortify unarmed damage (1000pts)
G- Fortify Melee damage (1000pts)
H- Fortify magicka rate  (1000pts)

2- God's Armor

A- Shock Damage (1000pts Radio Damage)

3- God's Boots

A - Fortify Sneak (1000pts)

4- God's Gauntlets-

A- Fortify Magicka (1000pts)


[color=#ffffff](pts) means the attributes of each "Enchantment"[/color]
[/color][/u]
author: BNGAMER
